title: Liam Atticus Clarke
bio: I'm a creative and passionate developer looking to lend my strengths to an equally passionate team. If you find my work compelling, reach out so we can start building something awesome!

projects.name: SVG Plotter
projects.description: Convert SVG files to GeoJSON for use in mapping software.

projects.name: Interactive Seating Charts
projects.description: Find the best seats in the house for thousands of popular venues. Narrow your search by selecting sections or simply zoom in to filter tickets to visible rows.

projects.name: fanxchange.com
projects.description: Consumer site for Fanxchange's live-event marketplace.

experience.title: Principal Software Engineer
achievements: Co-designed, and built a real-time generative conversation system that enabled a 3-way authoriship dynamic between ML models, human/procedural directors, and a live audience.
Designed and Built a web application that enables a multi-director experience for producing a generative show.
Automated deployment of short-lived compute resources on GCP for the purpose of running a reoccurring show that has large CPU/GPU overhead.
Collaborated with a music producer to develop an emotionally expressive AI music composer in the browser.
Built a novel node-based web interface for chaining together ML/procedural generators (primarily Google Magenta models).
Used chunked generation and rendering techniques to produce a near real-time, modular music generator which encouraged experimentation and play.

Designed a pipeline for large repositories of assets creative assets that resulted in a graph-based representation of their relationships. This enabled the creation of an asset search engine as well as a pipeline for training ML models.

experience.title: Freelance Software Developer
achievements: Modernized architecture and deployment of an automated cryptocurrency trading system.
Worked with stakeholders to design and build dashboards and internal tools for managing large crypto portfolios.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer
achievements: Lead the migration of seating chart data and related software from Fanxchange to the Vivid Seats platform.
Worked closely with content team to enhance the workflow for producing live-event seating charts.
Deployed workflow automation that doubled output of new seating charts.
Built a real-time dashboard for coverage tracking and quality assurance based on feedback from my team.
Managed ingestion of thousands of seating charts and associated metadata from three large data acquisitions.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer
achievements: Engineered an end-to-end solution for industry-leading live-event seating charts.
Developed sophisticated map renderers for Web, iOS, and Android.
Created a 360Â°, gyroscope-enabled 'view from your seat' feature for the web platform.
Provided technical evaluation of software and related data prior to corporate acquisitions.
Worked closely with design team to execute on a complete rewrite/redesign of fanxchange.com.
Designed and built a solution for deploying customized live-event marketplaces for B2B clients.
Prototyped an interactive seating chart to replace the existing solution provided by a third-party.
